overview: A heat wave sends the residents of a New York City tenement to their fire escapes for whatever breeze is stirring.  The tenants are a cross section of melting-pot culture: Irish, Jewish, German, and Italian dialetcs create a rich aural mix on the sound track.  As small talk is exchanged among the residents of different floors, an off-camera hurdy-gurdy supplies an often ironic counter-point to the action
title: Hurdy Gurdy
